channel.title: CVE Feed for The Mercurial Project -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for The Mercurial Project -- all products

item.title: CVE-2019-3902|2024-08-04T19:26:26.699Z -- the%20mercurial%20project -- mercurial
item.description: A flaw was found in Mercurial before 4.9. It was possible to use symlinks and subrepositories to defeat Mercurial's path-checking logic and write files outside a repository.
